Import packages and download data
```{python}
# Packages
import pandas as pd 
import os 

# Data
folder_path = r"C:\Users\jmull\Downloads" # Edit this to chose where you want your data
file_path = r"ACLED_2017-2024-Q1-QTA.csv"
full_path = os.path.join(folder_path, file_path)
acled = pd.read_csv(full_path)
```

Create a new csv file with subsetted data
```{python}
# Subset by Central American countries
acled_CA = acled[acled["region"] == "Central America"]

# Subset by relevant variables
columns = ["event_id_cnty", "event_date", "event_type", 
           "sub_event_type", "actor1", "actor2", 
           "inter1", "inter2", "interaction", 
           "country", "admin1", "latitude", 
           "longitude", "geo_precision", "notes"]

# Create a new csv
file_path = "acled_project_data.csv"
acled_path = os.path.join(folder_path, file_path)
acled_CA.to_csv(acled_path, index=False)
```
